description: This course explores in depth the issues most crucial to artists working today in an
increasingly globalized art scene.  Students investigate the complexities of new media,
new methods of production and exhibition, and theoretical models through readings and a
required field trip to a contemporary art museum.  Students analyze both journalistic
criticism and theoretical texts, encompassing a wide variety of perspectives, and respond
through short writing assignments and classroom discussion.  Fee for field trip may be
fullname: Art Now: Critical Issues in Contemporary Art
